paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 variant p.Leu552Ser, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Ten of 35 heterozygous individuals were symptomatic (mean QTc of the 35 individuals was 466 ± 47 ms) and all 43 non-carrier family members were non-symptomatic (mean QTc 416 ± 23 ms).
Ten of 35 heterozygous individuals were symptomatic (mean QTc of the 35 individuals was 466 ± 47 ms) and all 43 non-carrier family members were non-symptomatic (mean QTc 416 ± 23 ms).

functional_data.summary: Described as a Finnish founder mutation, documented in 6 unrelated Long QT syndrome Finnish families.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregated in families with Long QT syndrome.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is a founder mutation in the Finnish population.
key_quotes: Ten of 35 heterozygous individuals were symptomatic (mean QTc of the 35 individuals was 466 ± 47 ms) and all 43 non-carrier family members were non-symptomatic (mean QTc 416 ± 23 ms).

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted detailed penetrance data and individual records for the KCNH2 variant.
